title: Northern Merge
description: Northern Merge is an enchanting casual merge game where you can create new items while exploring a magical forest. The clever Scientist Cat has hidden objects throughout the forest, waiting for you to discover and merge them into valuable treasures. As you merge and unlock new items, you'll earn emeralds to boost your progress. The friendly cat welcomes new guests and invites you to dive into this mysterious world of surprises. With relaxing gameplay and endless merging possibilities, this game is perfect for those who love exploration and creativity!
